metadata.title: CVE-2023-32359 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.This issue is fixed in iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2. A user's password maybe read aloud by VoiceOver.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
